name: Lumberman VR
description:
LumberMan VR is a simple game where the player is a lumberjack. The goal is to chop a pile of wood logs. Chopping right in the middle of the log gives the maximum points, whereas chopping asymmetrically, gives less points.

The game was developed on Unity for SteamVR (HTC Vive, Oculus Rift).

Sources Attribution
3D models pack -> https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/exterior/sawmill-in-the-forest-76...
3D squirrel model -> https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/2136
Ambiant forest sound -> https://freesound.org/people/reinsamba/sounds/18765/
River sound -> https://freesound.org/people/CastleofSamples/sounds/145394/
SplittingWood.wav -> https://freesound.org/people/MHockett/
Chopping Wood_01.wav -> https://freesound.org/people/CGEffex/
Chopping Wood_02.wav -> https://freesound.org/people/CGEffex/
